text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Morning, Trainer! Since it was getting kind of old, I bought a new flower to replace the one you had there!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Over on your desk, that's my dad's promotional good luck handkerchief! Feng Shui-wise it's nice, and it's made of good materials so it's a present! And―

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Since the window's closed, let's open it! Ventilation is fundamental to Feng Shui! With this, it'll be a fortuitous omen☆ Well then, see you at training～!
Thanks to her taking the initiative, the trainers' room seemed brighter and because of that work seemed to go more smoothly. Although―
Normally, the trainer's role is to support the Uma Musume. I started spending the days thinking of ways to repay her―
Then one day

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Huh? It's Trainer～! What a coincidence! ……Oh, that's right! Are you free right now? There's a place I want to take you!
I didn't particularly have any plans so, I followed along with Copano Rickey―

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: And so, we're here at the zoo! Ehehe, getting out and getting the qi flowing is a great way to increase your luck!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: And the most important part, is heading in a favorable direction! This zoo is in a favorable direction for your luck and I've always wanted to bring you here. Oh……

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: ……crying? Sorry Trainer, I'm going to go take a look!

text_block_list.name: Timid Girl
text_block_list.text: ―……where is everyone……? Uhuu, uwaaan……!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Are you okay? What's wrong?

text_block_list.name: Timid Girl
text_block_list.text: Uu……Uuwaaaaan! Everyone's gone……!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: I see, so you got separated from your family, huh…… But it seems like the area around here isn't very good. It's so damp.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: For now, do you wanna come with Big Sis to the lost kids center?! I'll take you to a more wonderful place!
And when Copano Rickey tried to take the girl's hand―
Ah, there she is～!

text_block_list.name: Girl's Older Sister
text_block_list.text: Sorry, I let go of your hand……! Mom and the others are looking for you over there, let's go! Um…… thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: No, I was just staying here together with her! I'm glad you found her, be careful on the way back!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Oh, that's right! When heading back, try taking that big path in the middle! It's a lucky path so you should be able to return safely!

text_block_list.name: Girl's Older Sister
text_block_list.text: ……lucky path? Um…… Miss, are you a weir-…… an occult person?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: I wouldn't say it's occult though…… Hmmm, but well, it's sometimes misunderstood, I guess? Why's that?

text_block_list.name: Girl's Older Sister
text_block_list.text: But……at school, they told us that if someone says weird things to you, they're trying to take you and that we should be careful―Ah!

text_block_list.name: Girl's Older Sister
text_block_list.text: N-now that I think about it, miss, you said you would 『Take her to a more wonderful place!』……!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Oh that. In this area, in regards to Feng Shui, the qi tends to stagnate. When a place is kind of damp, doesn't it kind of lower your spirit?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: A corner where many things collide, it's called the cautionary boundary of the 8 trigrams, I was just thinking that it would be better if this girl was in a luckier place―

text_block_list.name: Girl's Older Sister
text_block_list.text: ……Collide……trigrams……? I've never heard those words before. I-it's true……!! Moooooooooooom～～～!!
I calm the child down, and as we were walking to the lost kids center, explain that Copano Rickey is a student at the academy and not a strange person.

text_block_list.name: Girl's Older Sister
text_block_list.text: I-I-I'm sorry, I'm sorry! For surprising you like that, um, um…… I'm sorry～!
While things ended safely, I wondered if this incident had her feeling down. That's what I was thinking but……it seems I was slightly off though.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Huuu-, I guess I messed up! I was saved thanks to Trainer! I guess Feng Shui can seem kind of scary from the perspective of a child.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: I guess it would have been better to calm down and explain it better to that girl. Sometimes I get told 『Rickey, you come on too strong』. Yeah, I need to reflect on that!
She was pretty talkative normally. She could reflect on things, and quickly handle her own mental care but…… her expression seemed kind of distant.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Eh? Yeah! Of course. I'll try not to make the same mistake again, and I'll think of a way to phrase it so that it doesn't scare them!
I knew Copano Rickey was capable of improving the perception of Feng Shui. She could make plans, put them in to motion, and properly prevent the disruption of qi.
But that's exactly why, we need to get a handle on any of those negative emotions she's feeling. I could sense her desperation――and I told her that.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: …………Ah. I see……that could be. Well……a long time ago, papa told me something like that.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: You try to 『Solve things with Feng Shui』 too much. Your own feelings……especially when you're feeling vulnerable, you tend to avoid facing those feelings.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: I tend to fall back on Feng Shui unconsciously, so fully suppressing that is not good. I understand that but……ahaha, maybe I'm going too far.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Umm, well……what should I do? Solving things without using Feng Shui, how do I do that again?
Copano Rickey is at a loss. Perhaps, right now what she deseperately needs, is simply to just come face to face with those feelings.
choice_data_list: At that time, how did you feel?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Eh? How did I feel……? Well, let's see, when that girl let out a scream, my chest tightened, and my head went blank……

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: ……『Sad』……that might be true! But, being misunderstood happens all the time, so it wasn't all that shocking.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: It's just……I wonder if I could have done better……
choice_data_list: Then, 『I wish I explained it better』?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: ……Yeah, that's it! I usually don't speak out but, so they can become lucky, I need to explain properly……!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: …………Yeah, that's what I thought. ……that's what I was thinking.
Copano Rickey was looking at me, at some point her cheerful, soft expression had returned.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I'm fine now! It feels like a weight has been lifted off my shoulders. ……I must have been holding those feelings in.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: It was helpful. ……Thank you, Trainer!
